name: Tongo
Relationship: MELILOTUS. ANTHOXANTHUM, ASPERULA, and TONGA contain COUMARIN, the active principle. Compare them in hay-fever, also, TRIFOL.; NAPHT.; SABAD.
Common names: Diptrix Odorata Seeds of Coumarouna - a tree in Guiana

Head: Tearing pain in supraorbital nerve, with heat and throbbing pain in head and epiphora
Confused, especially the occiput, with somnolence and a sort of intoxication
Trembling in right upper lid
Coryza; nose stopped, must breathe through mouth
Extremities: Tearing pains in hip-joints, femur, and knee, especially left side
